articles.title: Names of six Imran Khan aides added to stop list: Report

articles.author: AP
articles.title: China closes Guangzhou to most arrivals as outbreak spreads
articles.description: Shanghai has taken the brunt of the surge, with another 26,087 cases announced on Monday, only 914 of which showed symptoms. The city of 26 million is under a tight lockdown, with many residents confined to their homes for up to three weeks.
